pages.text: Contracts are frequently sent into your mailbox. They are wrapped in a sealed envelope when you receive them. You can open the sealed envelope by clicking it.$(br2)You can view the details of the contract by clicking it.
You can accept contracts by clicking the contract item on the bulletin board.

pages.title: Contract Requirements
pages.text: You can see the items you need to hand in to complete the contract by clicking on the bulletin board.$(br)Contracts that you receive from the mailbox only require you to hand in a few items.

pages.title: Handing in Objects
pages.text: You can hand in the objects that are required to complete the contract by putting them into $(l:packaging/envelope)envelopes$(/l) or $(l:packaging/parcel)parcels$(/l) and putting them into the outbox of your mailbox. You may send as many envelopes or parcels as you like for a contract. Note that your mailbox will only get emptied if the chunk it is in is loaded.
